name: Psycho on the loose
description: An assassin with a rise in his career to kill his target is out on a murdering spree. He is out there with alot of motives but his main motive is two eliminate all targets and who ever may get in his way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
